body.name: GoveeLife Mini Air Purifier for Bedroom, HEPA Smart Filter Air Purifier with App Alexa Control for Pet Hair, Odors, Pollen, Smoke, Portable Air Cleaner with 3 Speeds, 2 Modes, Timer, Aroma for Home
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 16 hrs 51 mins
features: App & Voice Control: Connect your smart air purifier to App for features such as power on/off, custom/sleep mode, timer, fan speed, and filter change reminders. Use with Alexa, Google Assistant, and IFTTT.

Effective Purification: This GoveeLife air purifier features a dual-channel 360° air intake design, certified by Energy Star, ETL, FCC, and CA65. It can purify a 376 sqft room once per hour. Compared to other air purifiers, it is smaller in size but equally as powerful.

Preset Custom Mode: You can pre-set 3 different switch times for the fan speed based on your preferences and create custom combinations. It will run at the corresponding fan speed level during the designated times to meet your customized purification needs.

Quiet Operation: This portable air purifier operates with a noise level as low as 24dB in sleep mode. It can create a tranquil and relaxing bedroom environment while providing reliable air purification effects. Enjoy fresher air while sleeping without interruption.

Aromatherapy: This air purifier has a built-in aromatherapy function, with a fragrance pad placed below the air outlet to add 4-5 drops of your favorite essential oil. Combine air purification with a pleasant fragrance to elevate your home to more comfortable and peaceful levels.

Auto Mode: Pair with GoveeLife Air Quality Monitor to activate automatic mode, the purifier can intelligently adjust the air speed based on the ambient PM2.5 condition. Note: GoveeLife Air Quality Monitor H5106 is sold separately.

Accessory Purchasing Tips: On Amazon, search "B0C4GXQVQK" to purchase aroma replacement pads, "B0BZV1XG6Y" for the Smart Air Quality Monitor H5106, and "B0C4DLRLNQ" and "B0C8MDGH5Q" for air purifier replacement filters.

What in the Box: Smart Mini Air Purifier*1, HEPA Filter(Pre-Installed)*1, Aroma Pad (In the Aroma Box) *1,Aroma Pad(External)*2, Power Adapter*1, Quick Start Gudie *1, User Manual *1. Please Note: Our power adapter will be placed at the bottom of the air purifier. Please take out the power adapter after opening the package, install the filter element, and then use our air purifier.

productInformation.value: #1,703 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #20 in HEPA Filter Air Purifiers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for small rooms
reviews.reviewText: It is top standard for its HEPA filter. The build quality is great, and assembling it is easy. Just grab it from the top and rotate off the bottom to remove the plastic and simply reinsert the filter and plug it in. I have it running continuously on the sleep mode, and it is very quiet.I have a bunch of allergies and need to take Loratadine every day, but I do think this is effective. I'll update back later.Anyways, there are multiple settings that you cycle through with a press of button, and you can control it with your phone (it must be a on a 2.4 ghz band, so 5G will not work. This isn't really an issue if you are not far from your router). I'd say it's a great product for its cost but do note that light for its specified setting is always on, but it is very weak, so you won't really be bothered by it even if you were trying to sleep. I have it raised up since it is more effective that way. To reiterate though, it should only be used in a small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: It's really quiet on the lowest setting. I have one in my bedroom and one in my office, and you can barely hear them unless you're really trying to or right next to it. You can use the app to create a schedule as well, so I have it set to kick up to high power for an hour or so during the daytime when we're not normally in that space and it seems to be helping a lot with air quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works really well. Placed above cat litter box and I don't smell it anymore.Easy to put together and take apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The GoveeLife Mini Air Purifier has proven to be a wise investment for my home. I purchased two for the bedrooms, and their HEPA smart technology has noticeably improved the air quality. The compact design is ideal for bedrooms, and the quiet operation ensures a peaceful night's sleep. I appreciate the smart features that allow easy monitoring and control. Overall, these purifiers deliver on performance and functionality, making them a valuable addition to any home.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s compact and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and quite
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my daughter's room and the sleep mode isn't too loud. She likes to sleep with it on and it sounds like soft white noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is built very sturdy, easy to use and connects to Bluetooth easily , moves a tremendous amount of air and yet is very quiet even when on its highest setting! I definitely recommend this product for your small room! My only complaint is that it's on the 2.4ghz WiFi and most people have 5ghz so this means that I couldn't connect via WiFi, which ultimatelyMeans that I can not control it or get updates while I'm not home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
